reviews.text: I enjoyed another awesome visit today, despite the weather- downpour to and from the zoo.  The sea lion show was spectacular with an a bonus of a bald eagle flying across the water.  There's a lot of construction projects at the entrance and throughout the park.  So be aware.  The lunch at the Yukon section was tasty. It was fun watching the fillets be prepared then fried right in front of me.  Polar bears were active but the big cats were not. Lots and lots of families out and about.  A great time.
Outstanding zoo, very quiet in the winter. Each area is very well themed and the enclosures look capacious. The food is well priced and the outlets are well themed too.

Highly recommended if you have 2-3 hrs minimum.
Boats round is very good and North pole part

Something for the entire family and a lot to see, with nicely designed animal enclosures, a live show and guided tours. The park is easy to reach by public transport in the middle of the state capital. The entry fee is perhaps one of the few downsides, as well as limited parking.
Yukon theme is nice, the western town in summer most be a lovely place having coffee.

The impressive building is free to visit. It’s nicely situated in a park, near to the Maschsee and several museums. Inside there are some interesting models of Hannover before and after the WWII bombing. For part of the year it’s possible (for a fee) to ride a unique parabolic lift up the dome to a viewing platform.
Beautiful place. A good venue for wedding photos apparently, lots of couples getting married and taking photoshoots here around the lake and in the park.
Go to top of the dome in the elevator best views of Hannover
Magnificent building open for tourists with city models through the years.
Great place to visit.

Great place. Young students, greedy for knowledge. The University looks good inside and outside. Free entry, free bathroom, small vending machines, own kiosk sells POS materials of this University. Close to it, are huge parks for walking, also stop of tram.
Wold famous University TU9
A better floor plan would help to find some rooms.
The main building has a beautiful architecture 😊
Very beautiful place!

Great place. Young students, greedy for knowledge. The University looks good inside and outside. Free entry, free bathroom, small vending machines, own kiosk sells POS materials of this University. Close to it, are huge parks for walking, also stop of tram.
Wold famous University TU9
A better floor plan would help to find some rooms.
The main building has a beautiful architecture 😊
Very beautiful place!

In love with the natural beauty this place had to offer. Cascading rivers along the mountains, waterfall, mineral water well, flowers and tree and stone that I hadn't seen before. Facilities like chairlift available. A definite place to visit.
This river is clear and makes Borjomi Central Park much more beautiful
Good
Beautiful!
Старенький но приятный городской парк Боржоми.
Beautiful park with pretty nature!
It is very beautiful but a little bit confused.
Great place with natural feel
Nice for walks, although it seems like a forest you will never be out of sight of the next path, no matter how hard you try to find a private spot. This can be both bad and good, depends on you.
Too big and nice, I loved it.

A very nice cultural experience today at the Landesmuseum Hannover Germany.  Man over the ages has not changed.  Woman are respected today as they were not in the past.  The art exhibited demonstrated a need for all humans be responsible, mindful, kind, and respectful to each other.
A great place to go with kids on a family weekend. Living fish, losts of historical iteams. 2-3 hours of learning for children. Location is good. Nor far from the city center.

Great place, spent a nice Sunday here. The exhibition specifically wanted to see was better than expected.
And on the ground floor they have an exhibition of the evolution of the earth and animals, which was equally fasanating.
All the children in there were full of awe.
So can only suggest a visit, took some photos of the aquariums WITHOUT THE FLASH!!! And a few of the Artworks.
There's also a small but good café for a break, can recommend the food and beverages.
Good museum to visit, just wished that they have the exhibitions information in English as well.
Interesting museum with aquatics and extensive art exhibition. Has a good cafe as well.

A beautiful collection displayed in a really interesting building. I so appreciated that the descriptions of the paintings were in German and English.The coffee shop is also worth checking out and has a beautiful view of the Maschsee.
Very good art museum. Was not expecting the size and scale!  Great thought provoking art.
A great space for viewing awesome collection.

The museum has a spectacular architectural gallery. Among his interesting collection of art, German expressionism, French modernism, etc., you will find Picasso, Chagall, Ernst, Bacon, Dumas, etc. There is also a large bookstore and a cafeteria. It is a must see if you visit Hannover. Recommended!
Wide range of modern art.  Very interesting and well worth a visit.

A beautiful collection displayed in a really interesting building. I so appreciated that the descriptions of the paintings were in German and English.The coffee shop is also worth checking out and has a beautiful view of the Maschsee.
Very good art museum. Was not expecting the size and scale!  Great thought provoking art.
A great space for viewing awesome collection.

The museum has a spectacular architectural gallery. Among his interesting collection of art, German expressionism, French modernism, etc., you will find Picasso, Chagall, Ernst, Bacon, Dumas, etc. There is also a large bookstore and a cafeteria. It is a must see if you visit Hannover. Recommended!
Wide range of modern art.  Very interesting and well worth a visit.
Many old trams, nice special exhibitions, tram Simulator, toys for children, ride on an old tram, inexpensive Café, ...
Tolle Location

Unsere Kinder können irgendwie nicht genug von den Straßenbahnen bekommen. Die Fahrt auf der Außenstrecke ist unser Favorit. Die zweite Hälfte verbringen wir meist im Haus, in dem die Kinder spielen und wir alle essen können. Bei schönem Wetter kann man auch auf einer ganz kleinen Eisenbahn fahren.
Nicht ganz 5 Sterne da die Sauberkeit der Einrichtung, speziell die Toiletten und das Spielzimmer, an vielen Ecken verloren gegangen ist.

Es ist ein strassenbahnmuseum welches  Fahrzeuge aus Deutschland, Holland  und Österreich möglichst betriebsfähig der Nachwelt erhält.  Es werden auf  einem Grundkurs und auf einer stichstrecke regelmässig Fahrten mit den diversen historischen Fahrzeuge für besucher angeboten.erste Fahrt gratis, jede weiter 1 Euro. Es gibt auch die Möglichkeit eine STRASSENBAHN unter Aufsicht selbst zu fahren. Weiters gibt es eine kindereisenbahzum mitfahren auf einem rundkurs. Eine modellstrassenbahn gibt es auch und die Möglichkeit sich kulinarisch zu stärken . Einen oder auch mehrere besuche ist es wert. Ausserdem gibt es in der Regel einmal monatlich eine veranstaltung (z. B. Zu Ostern ostereiersuchen).

Das Museum an sich ist schon einen Besuch wert. Hinzu kommen tolle Events wie z.b. Oltimer- oder Militärausstellungen. Das absolute Highlight ist allerdings das jährlich stattfindende SNNTG Festival mit viel Liebe zum Detail, tollem Publikum und einem umfangreichen Programm. Empfehlenswert für jung und alt!

This is one of my favorite restaurants in Hannover. I am coming to this restaurant for past 3 years. The food is really delicious. Its good place to come with friends and family. The prices are really cheap and the quantity is really good. They prepare the food fresh and the quality is the best

This is a great place to get authentic Vietnamese cuisine at an affordable price. The service is super fast and efficient with professional and friendly staff.

This is not an upmarket restaurant but a great place for well priced, tasty food together with friends.
Awesome and cozy foodplace. Always fresh and more than fair priced.

I used to love this restaurant, but in the last 1 year all the waitress and the chef is changed to middle eastern. Im not racist but they always messed up my order. They are not friendly at all and always ignore my order note. Its not like im picky but i cant eat some of the ingredient and they refuse to make a new dish for me. I will change the review if only they back like the old times.

I just recently come and the waiter is super unfriendly and also messed up ny order so bad. But they refuse to admit that it is their fault. Really-really dissapointed
Food was good. Customer service was ok
Good wine and friendly service. Little original look restaurant with late meal but food is poor the way it taste and look.
Very good food and great service. It is one of the best places I ate into in hannove.
Cozy. Delicious. Reasonable price. Grandma’s rinderrouladen is 10/10.
Really nice food, and nice atmosphere.
Top
Nice place, good service food very tasty in reasonable price. On photo "Mantu" dunplings filled with meat, price 9,90.

1. No Credit or Debit card accepted  
2. We did reservation for 15 people the floor area  but the place was almost enough for 6 people. Result: many people of our group couldn't join. Almost No customer service.
I liked the Kabili.
Good service and nice food and atmosphere
A super location in the city centre of Hanover. Delicious afghan food. Friendly and courteous service.
Good food, particularly the schweinhaxe. Pleasant helpful staff. Very lively. The Pils is alright although it would be better if they had an unfiltered beer.
Nice German environment, good size dishes and great beer, will go again
This is an 112% German place for eating and drinking which you should not miss. A "must stop" every time I come to Hannover...

Worth you to visit again and again 
Remarkable dishes 
See what we finished 
If you were in Hanover be here
Nice authentic looking place, good food and friendly staff.

Visited this restaurant several times and I never felt disappointed. Food is great and I love the green tea rice they serve in particular. Their waitresses are very professional and friendly. Highly recommended.

I didn't have great expectations as this is a restaurant in a hotel catering to business travelers whom one can serve almost anything provided the place is closer to their room or computer. But I found a really nice Thai food selection, beautifully and eloquently described by the server, a good selection of wine by the glass and a great hospitality.
Soooo niiicceee ! Thanks Sumit. Congrats and thanks for your hospitality. We will be back for sure

One of the best fine dining thai restaurants at a convenient location at Sheraton Grande Sukhumvit next to Asoke BTS station. We let the waiter help us organize dishes for 4 to share. They serve 3 tyoes of rice, pandan rice, brown rice and plain white rice.
Great ambiance. Lovely staff and pretty decent selection of vegan options. Not as much as vegan restaurants but good if you're going out with omnivores.
